specialities:
Thermal Imaging:

Everything in our environment emits heats. A thermal camera is able to detect this heat and create a thermal image based on that information. Temperature differential can assist with detection of problems related to moisture infiltration and plumbing leaks. It can also be used to find hidden heating and cooling losses due to inadequate or missing insulation. Early correction of these conditions may reduce the amount of damage caused and the associated repair costs.
Our basic inspection package includes infrared thermographic scan of basement exterior foundation walls and vaulted top floor ceilings. A more extensive thermal scan of each room, including attic (if accessible), roof, walls, floors, foundation and ceilings is available at an additional cost.
For more information on the limitations of Thermal Imaging check out our blog post.

Our inspectors are certified and carry full insurance.  We are the #1 rated inspectors in the Hamilton - Niagara Region.  We continue to win numerous awards in the home inspection category which most recently include; 2021 Consumer Choice Award - Hamilton - Niagara, 2020 Hamilton Spectator Readers Choice award, 2020 Niagara Falls Review Platinum Award and the 2018 CHCH Business Excellence Award.  We have an overall combined google and Homestars rating of 98% which is tops in our category as well.
